description:
Thanks to Wayne, the members of the Cafe successfully determine Shinyao`s location, but Midnight Sun, the Umbra extermination organization led by Van Helsing XIII, capture Shinyao and Chris first.
Ton and her friends fail to rescue Shinyao again. However, Helsing tells Ton he will return Shinyao to her if she accepts his conditions: cease all contact with Umbra and forget about the incident. Helsing`s words leave Ton unsure what to do...
That night, Ton leaves the Cafe.
Source: crunchyroll
